if ((!(this.allzero(this.mant,lodigit+1))))
     throw "intValueExact(): Decimal part non-zero: " + this.toString();

if ((this.exp+lodigit)>9)  // early exit
     throw "intValueExact(): Conversion overflow: "+this.toString();
